# ForceMode.impulse

**Case**

A direct adjustment to a body’s linear or angular momentum.

## Declaration

```swift
case impulse
```

## Discussion

The quantity that user sets via [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ForceEffectParameters/setForce(_:index:)] has the units of mass * distance / time. `impulse` mode causes a change in linear momentum.

The quantity that user sets via [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/ForceEffectParameters/setTorque(_:index:)] has the units of mass * distance^2 / time. `impulse` mode causes a change in angular momentum.
